name: Streadata.io API Gallery - USA.Gov Corporate Consumer Contact Information
description: This is a repository of usa.gov corporate consumer contact information APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: USA.Gov Corporate Consumer Contact Information
apis.description: We make the Corporate Consumer Contact listing found in the Consumer Action Handbook (PDF) available via a REST API. The API programmatically returns all of the information contained in the directory, or you can query the API to return just a subset of the available information.
